title: Urban mixtures
creator_credit: Martin Cohen, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Frontiers downunder”.
Four migrants talk about their adjustments to, and attitudes towards, Australian society. Although they are from different economic backgrounds, each has some involvement in migrant community, through social work, ethnic radio, and the ethnic community council.
